unnormalised: Arre yaar, return policies are so crucial, right? Imagine buying a saree online for Diwali and it's not quite what you expected. Easy returns are a must! I remember Auntie Padma had a terrible experience with a shop in Chandni Chowk. Hope everyone offers hassle-free returns like Flipkart these days. Return within 7 days at least! And please, no restocking fees! Makes me want to eat a whole plate of biryani just thinking about the stress!
